contents.defaultValue:
Energy weapons, except railguns and particle

cannons, have no penetration. Note that

weapons that do no penetration cannot fire

through transparent surfaces, instead needing

to melt or destroy the surface before firing

through.

When firing through gaseous substances

(mist, smoke, water mist, etc.) damage is re-

duced by 1 per 2 m (1") that the beam travels

through the obstruction, except for railguns

which fire a physical projectile. Subtract this

damage right after the dodge roll is made or

declined. If it reduces the damage to 0 or less,

the shot "misses".

contents.tooltip: Single Shot. Characters can fire one bullet as a simple action. The player totals their Firearms skill plus accuracy and can use that many dice from their Finesse pool to fire the weapon.
contents.label: Blast
